summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2132, for the improvement of First Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from Virginia Street to Denny Way, by the installation of a system of cluster lights along the curb lines of said streets, together with the installation of such poles, conduits and wires as may be necessary for the proper installation and equipment of said system, the poles in all regular blocks to be erected as nearly as may be at intervals of one hundred twenty (120) feet, under Ordinance No. 21376, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
